entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16 except minus 19 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 19 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 8:01 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:01 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
